title: Anyone else experienced bugs with the looting system?
body:
Just went to open a chest from my loot with a key I had forged, however when I clicked to open nothing happened. I clicked in and out of the loot section to come back and find my chest and key gone with no loot left behind at all. 

This is not the first bug I have experienced with the looting system and I was wondering if anyone else has experienced any other bugs? 
( {{champion:121}} )  if so, what happened?

replies.body: Yeah, there is this big ass button called "open 10 chests" when you have 10 or more chests... upon accidental clicking, possibly from green cakes around the camp fire... you will then be greeted by 10 champion unlocks................................................ Y_Y
Every chest I open glitches. The animation won't finish. When I go back to the main screen and then into the crafting screen, my loot is always there.
Check your purchase history, will show you what you got.
ive had numerous shit not show up until i log back in
